Padita Agu bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood nke mepụtara ihe nkiri ahụ, Aha m abụghị Ulusho ma bụrụ onye a maara na ihe nkiri, Last Three digits, O nwere ọwa YouTube ebe ọ na-ekerịta ahụmịhe na nkuzi gbasara mmekorịta ya na ụmụ nwanyị.

O mepụtara ihe nkiri My name is not Olosho nke ọ bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Demola Adedoyin, Segun Arinze, Rachel Oniga nke Theo Ukpaa duziri. Onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood kwụsịtụrụ nwa oge na 2005 iji mụọ ihe ma laghachi na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri dị ka onye isi na-eme na Last three digit, ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị nke Moses Inwang duziri na 2012.
Ndị ohi ji égbè dinara Padita na-eto eto n'ike mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise ma nke a nyere ya ihe mgbu nke o nwere ike imeri mgbe e mesirị.
Alụmdi na nwunye nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood dara mgbe ọ chọpụtara na ọ nweghị ịhụnanya na mmekọrịta na mbụ
N'ịkọwa ihe isi ike ya nye ndị na-akwado ya, ọ zutere ya n'ebe enyi ya wee lụọ di na nwunye n'ụbọchị mbu ha zutere.
